definitions: a thing that increases the amount, level, or strength of something

examples.text: the visit had been a morale raiser for his crew

shortDefinitions: thing that increases amount, level, or strength of something

definitions: a person who breeds or grows animals or plants

examples.text: my parents are simple cattle raisers

shortDefinitions: person who breeds or grows animals or plants

definitions: something which lifts or moves an object to a higher position or level
shortDefinitions: something which lifts or moves object to higher position or level

definitions: (in poker or brag) a person who bets a specified amount more than another player

examples.text: the original raiser hesitated and checked

shortDefinitions: (in poker or brag) person who bets specified amount more than another player

definitions: a person who makes a higher bid in the same suit as that bid by their partner

examples.text: raising from two to three is permissible without normal support provided the raiser has other strength

shortDefinitions: person who makes higher bid in same suit as that bid by their partner
